name: Author of Time and Space
description:
You messed with the space time continuum in order to write your novel and now the universe is collapsing. Pilot your time traveling robot through an increasingly warped maze in order to retrieve the chapters scattered through time. Face spikes, turrets, lasers and the collapse of the timeline in order to save all life as we know it. 

This game was created for the week long 2021 Epic MegaJam. Made by  Friendly Neighbourhood Game Dev with the help of KnakAttack. We hope you enjoy the game!

Special thanks to the following creators for use of their assets:

Background music is “starter music” Epic starter content (because we are so creative),

Death sounds clipped from “CC-DS Punch Cinematic 03” BOOM Library,

Minigun firing sound is clipped and edited from "AWDS SMG Uzi 45 Heavy Burst" BOOM Library,

Lazer button sounds clipped from “Generic Button Metal Small 09” BOOM Library,

Menu button sounds clipped from “Generic Click Wood Small 07” BOOM Library,

Roboto font from Unreal Engine fonts.
